__e: When we went to the hospital, I come back, you guys are all still playing poker, smoking cigars and eating pizza.
We'll smoke dime cigars and play canasta the whole passage back.
I went out for a new box of cigars and when I returned
Two cops, going in the cigar store across the street.
Remember the time that we stole your dad's cigars... then we all smoked them behind the house?
Been stealing money from dad's cigar box again?
